Stock bonus: N/A

Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 9,34,000

Other details: 40 Paid Annual Leaves Days + Additional Leave Categories includes Maternity, Paternity, Adoption, Bereavement and Covid Support Leaves + 12 Public Holidays + Leave Encashment Encashment of up to 30 Days every year (Approx. 48,000) + Medical Insurances + Certification Program  INR 25,000, and many others.

Edited: Changed from SDE2 to SDE1. It was miss from my side. Thank you Abhijeet for calling it out
